DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : The group Cervical Radiculopathy patient receive thoracic thrust manipulation demonstrate immediate short term significant clinically important change outcome compare sham manipulation group .
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Manipulation Patients With Cervical Radiculopathy
DOC.criteria: 1865 yr 3 4 Items positive Clinical Prediction Rule Cervical Radiculopathy history previous cervical thoracic spine surgery bilateral upperextremity symptom , sign symptom upper motor neuron disease , medical `` red flag '' ( e.g. , tumor , fracture , rheumatoid arthritis , osteoporosis , prolong steroid use ) .
